text: William Thorndike (January 22, 1795 July 12, 1835) was a Massachusetts lawyer and politician who served in the Massachusetts House of Representatives, and as a member and President of the Massachusetts Senate. ==See also== * 53rd Massachusetts General Court (1832) ==References== Category:Massachusetts lawyers Category:People from Beverly, Massachusetts Category:People from Bath, Maine Category:Members of the Massachusetts House of Representatives Category:Massachusetts state senators Category:Presidents of the Massachusetts Senate Category:Harvard University alumni Category:1795 births Category:1835 deaths Category:19th-century American politicians
title: William Thorndike
